content.rendered:
Transform, Expand, & Succeed with Shyft Digitally’s White Label Program!
Your #1 Partner in Growth!

In today’s lightning-fast digital world, the right partnership can be the difference between a struggling business and a 7-figure enterprise. Introducing Shyft Digitally's White Label Program - a curated set of services to propel your business to new heights. Whether you're an emerging brand or an established name looking to diversify, our program is your ticket to exponential growth and 10X Revenue!

Join Today

10X Your Business with Premium Outsourcing
Digital Marketing Agency

See the answers to some of our most commonly asked questions below.

Full Concierge Service Approach

We've got your back! Our white-label offerings encompass everything - from client onboarding and project management to consistent reporting.

Product & Sales Training

Experience excellence with a dedicated account manager, ensuring all your outsourced digital marketing requirements are seamlessly catered to.

Dedicated Account Manager

Benefit from our immersive training sessions and product showcases. We provide you with all the necessary tools to win over new clients for your business.

No Setup Fee & Free Support

Our white label digital marketing solutions come with a flexible pay-as-you-go model. We believe in retaining clients by providing 24/7 support.

White Label Google Ads Management

Comprehensive PPC Management for diverse ads across platforms like Google, Bing, and YouTube. Utilizing advanced AI and machine learning, our PPC algorithm operates non-stop to secure the best leads for your clients at unbeatable prices.

White Label Advanced SEO Services

Focus on your agency's priorities while we handle your clients' SEO requirements. Our white label SEO offerings pave the way for your agency's growth and success. Delegate your SEO clientele to the most reliable SEO experts in Canada.

White Label PR Writing & Distribution Services

Place your clients prominently across 30k+ top news platforms, reaching hundreds of thousands of subscribers & content creators. Enhance your online brand presence, acquire valuable backlinks, and gain visibility on major platforms.

White Label Web Design Service

Through our white-label web design & development, provide your clients with mobile-friendly, responsive designs that optimize branding, improve user interactions, and amplify conversions. Let our experts handle everything for you.

White Label Social Media Ads Management

Our state-of-the-art machine learning algorithm for social media ad management brings you the best leads for your clients at cost-effective rates. Client campaigns are fine-tuned to augment metrics like call volumes, quote inquiries, location searches, etc.

White Label Mobile Geo-fencing Ads

Boost local site visits by leveraging cutting-edge Geo Ad tools, targeting precise locations of your preference. Create personalized and relevant ad campaigns, leading to increased engagement and a higher return on investment.

Want to Know More About Our White Label Program?

Talk to an Expert !

THE SOLUTION

How Does Shyft Digitally Affiliate Program Works?

We value personal, word-of-mouth recommendations! That’s why we created the best affiliate marketing program where we take good care of your referral clients and reward you when you bring us new clients with no hassle or hoops to jump through.

 

Setup a Call with Your Client

Step #1

We LOVE referrals from trusted partners like you; they are our lifeblood, and that’s why we created an easy-to-follow and effective process to connect your client with our sales experts with a few clicks.

Get Full Sales Support

Step #2

After the proper introduction, our team will take care of getting to know your client, recommend the most effective solutions and back them up with case studies; we will even handle ongoing follow-up calls.

We Do All the Work

Step #3

With 11+ years in business and a 93% client satisfaction rate, we take pride in making our clients happier by providing effective services and strategic upgrades to boost their business.

 

10% Monthly Commission

Step #4

Earn ongoing commission for your client's lifetime, which creates a great passive income stream for your business: access exclusive promos, flash sales, and training with Green Lotus Agency CEO.

Advantages of Partnering with Shyft Digitally’s White Label Program

Time Efficiency

Expanding your service offerings can drain time. Between training personnel or perhaps recruiting new members to manage services like SEO, Google Ads, and web design, the hours add up. Outsourcing means you provide comprehensive services without overburdening your time or team.

Cost Savings

Ignoring high-demand services like SEO and PPC is a missed revenue opportunity. With software expenses and staffing overheads, the ROI can be compromised. Outsourcing boosts your savings, allowing you to leverage expertise without the hefty price tag.

Professional Expertise

The digital marketing space is ever-evolving. Doubling down on the latest trends and tools is non-negotiable. That’s why, we're committed to ensuring you stay ahead of the curve with our expert team of seasoned professionals, guaranteeing cutting-edge strategies for your clients as well.

Streamline Operations

Outsourcing core tasks allows you to refine and simplify internal processes. By focusing on what your team does best and leaving specialized services to the experts, you can achieve smoother workflows, quicker turnarounds, and ultimately, higher client satisfaction.

Resource Redistribution

By outsourcing specific tasks, you can strategically redirect your team's focus and expertise. This reallocation ensures that every member is engaged in roles where they excel the most, driving productivity and output. Thus, leading to improved client relations, quicker project completions, & business growth.

Quality Enhancement

Quality in digital marketing depends on specialist expertise, from white label SEO to custom tools and designs. Partnering with a white label provider ensures you have a team of experts for each project and its nuances. Plus, a dedicated account manager ensures streamlined operations and top-tier results.

Scalability & Growth

While business expansion is always welcomed, rapid growth can sometimes outpace your existing infrastructure's capabilities. Outsourcing specific tasks offers the flexibility to adapt to fluctuating demands effortlessly. Therefore, collaborating with a white label partner guarantees consistent and efficient service delivery.

Free Sales Training

Shyft Digitally's White Label Program goes beyond just providing services; we offer extensive training to ensure your team is adept at discussing these offerings with your clients. This guarantees transparency and trust from the beginning to the end of the sales cycle.

Value-Added For Growth

With firms increasing their online marketing spend—expected to reach 45% by 2020—services like SEO and Google Ads are in high demand. Shyft Digitally's White Label Program lets you capitalize on this trend effortlessly and makes sure our agency comes out on top.

Trusted by Top Digital Marketing Agencies in Canada, USA, and the Whole World!

Shyft Digitally is the go-to choice for agencies seeking fast, adaptable, and affordable digital marketing solutions. Our focus? Tangible results! We prioritize the client relationships you’ve meticulously built over the years. By collaborating with us, you can expand your service range without overstretching your resources, ensuring client loyalty and increased revenue.

Leveraging our comprehensive range of digital marketing services, many of our partners have experienced a 10x boost in their revenue streams. At Shyft Digitally, we don’t just offer tools and strategies; we provide a roadmap to exponential growth. By integrating our white-label solutions into your portfolio, you’re not just adding services, but also unlocking avenues for transformative results and financial success. 

  • Advanced Web Development Technology
  • Advanced Web Development Technology
  • Proven Track Record
  • All-in-one Web Solutions
  • ROI-focused Approach
  • Sales Driven Interactive Websites
  • Strong Security Compliance
  • Post Launch Support and Maintenance

Frequently asked questions (FAQ)

See the answers to some of our most commonly asked questions below.

How Does Our Affiliate & Referral Program Work?

Our referral program is straightforward; you connect with businesses in your network that could use our services. When they sign up for our marketing services, you receive a 10% monthly commission for the client's lifetime. You can recommend any of our marketing services, given that we offer more than 20 services, including SEO, Smart Site design, Google Ads, Facebook Ads, and social media.

Do I Need To Be Involved With the New Clients?

Yes, it’s essential to establish a connection with your clients and get to know them through your introduction and knowledge of what their business really needs. We require our referral partners to be at least involved in the first introductory and consultation call. We can take it from here and do all the follow-ups to close the deal and get you earning commissions.

 

Can my Affiliate Account be Canceled?

Green Lotus has the authority to determine none active partners and cancel dormant accounts. 

  • Affiliate partners are expected to generate a min of 1 referral that turns into a paid subscription every 3 months to maintain an active affiliate partner status.
  • This program is designed for energetic and goal-driven individuals who can refer new businesses every month. In case of such cancelation by Green Lotus, the partner will continue to receive a commission for 6 months following the cancellation date. 
  • An affiliate partner can cancel the partnership at any time.
How Much of a Reward Affiliate Referral Partners Get?

A 10% monthly commission for your client's lifetime, There is no need to track manually. We will provide you with dashboard access, so you will always know the progress of your commissions, future payouts, and exclusive offers for top-performing affiliate partners.

 

How do I Qualify for This Program?

We’re looking for an individual with 1+ years in marketing who is well-trusted in their local market with excellent communication and sales skills. This program is designed for only active partners who can refer clients on monthly bases and is not built for one-time referral scenarios. If you’re simply looking to connect us with a business that can use our services, please reach out, and we will make sure to appreciate your recommendations with a one-time referral fee as a thank you.

Can my White Label Account be Canceled?

Yes, like many partnerships, White Label Accounts can be canceled based on specific terms and conditions, such as non-compliance or inactivity. It's important to review our partnership agreement for detailed information on account management.

Are There Any Costs Associated with Joining the White Label Program?

No, joining our White Label Program is entirely cost-free. We aim to foster a mutually beneficial partnership where you can expand your services without any upfront costs or hidden fees, making it accessible to all.
